title: karumukhil vaNNam
sahitya:
karumukhil vaNNam kaNDOr tamakkenrum pirappu irappu uNDO nArAyaNA unran


anupallavi

  karai puraNDODum nin tiruvaDi gangaiyil nIrADik-koNDADi sannidhi tEdi nin


caraNam    nAda kSEtrattil Urvashi pIThattil malamuyar padmAsanattukku nI irukka
 tiruvuDan nILA bhUdEvi UrvashiyuDan nara nArAyaNar oru purattirukka
 nAradar pUjikka uttavar koNDADa garuDan kubEran karam kuvittirukka
 murayAi pUjikkum sura bhUsurarukkut-tiruvaruL tandiDa padariyil urai unran
